title: bullrun2024bro
author: bullrun2024bro
content: Hi everyone,I am looking for decent Twitter cryptocurrency or Bitcoin engagement groups to grow my personal Twitter account. Paid groups are fine, if they have a good reputation.I am not looking for fake followers or cheap mass follow strategies, which don't work in the long run and damage ones account.Any ideas? Would appreciate any good info!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I wouldn't say there are those types of groups, especially not for Twitter. you can buy followers, it's not hard work, but in reality, you won't gain much from it. Only a lot of inactive accounts and non-interested in your speech. your posts there will not have a single reply or repost.I did some analysis on Twitter and the results are more than devastating.it is best if you can manage your own account, but you have to be very active and attractive, so your account will grow naturally. that's the only way it can make sense.Or even you can run your own giveaway or something like that, where you will give some rewards for your new followers.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: [GUIDE] TWIENDS.COM - get countless followers on Twitter.Twiends.com might not meet your need but it can help and you can use it as an supplementary for any paid groups if you find them.I don't think followers from Twiends.com will be harmful for your accounts and I don't think followers from Twiends.com will affect your Twitter Audit Score.https://www.twitteraudit.com/

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 05, 2022, 12:57:17 PMI wouldn't say there are those types of groups, especially not for Twitter. you can buy followers, it's not hard work, but in reality, you won't gain much from it. Only a lot of inactive accounts and non-interested in your speech. There are definitely Twitter engagement groups on Discord and Telegram - I know of several mid-sized accounts that use them or have used them in the past. Unfortunately, none of the accounts would give me more detailed information. Probably because none of the accounts want users to know that they have used a paid service for engagement/followers in the past.Quote from: OcTradism on August 05, 2022, 01:52:33 PM~Thanks for the links. The thread is from 2019. Do you know if the service is still active?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: bullrun2020bro on August 05, 2022, 04:20:44 PMThanks for the links. The thread is from 2019. Do you know if the service is still active?Twiends still work but for your info, these followers are same as you said- cheap and not engagement from them. You can rather try to grow your follower naturally. I had one account with altcoin analysis and I was able to get some good number of followers within few months though I'm not anymore active there.

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on August 05, 2022, 04:27:37 PMTwiends still work but for your info, these followers are same as you said- cheap and not engagement from them. You can rather try to grow your follower naturally. I had one account with altcoin analysis and I was able to get some good number of followers within few months though I'm not anymore active there.Thanks for the update. I guess the service is not for me then. If any of you still have ideas or more information on engagement groups please let me know. Unfortunately, I haven't found anything useful yet.
